snippet: The Houston Astrodome, which has languished since being shuttered nearly six years ago, has earned a listing in the National Register of Historic Places.
abstract: Houston Astrodome, which has languished since being shuttered nearly six years ago, has earned a listing in National Register of Historic Places; federal listing may not be enough to save 48-year-old stadium from the wrecking ball.
lead_paragraph: The Houston Astrodome, which has languished since being shuttered nearly six years ago, has earned a listing in the National Register of Historic Places.
